text: Uye (rangarirai) apo Ibrahim akati: “Tenzi vangu, itai guta iri (Makkah) nzvimbo yerunyararo uye ipai vagari vemo michero, avo vanotenda muna Allah nezuva rokupedzisira.” Ivo (Allah) vakati: “Asi uyo asingatendi, ndichamusiya ari mukugutsikana kwenguva pfupi, uye ndozomukanda mumarwadzo emoto, uye zvirokwazvo iyi ndiyo nzvimbo yakaipisisa kusvika!”
